channel.title: Server message system
channel.description:
ok i need help adding one my plan is when you log in there is a bot it says how many messages you have when you log in (i can do that my self) and you use a command (::messages) and it opens the quest interface (i can do) but what i need help with is how to go along adding it to were only you can see your messages would i be able to change the pest control or wave mini points snippet to work with this??
fine ill test it out my self...
im going to use the grande exchange as a base for this
